translation.en: [man] What is it that haunts you?
Whose eyes peer at you from the dark?
translation.es: ¿Los ojos de quiénte miran desde la oscuridad?

translation.en: [boy 1] I think he went this way.
-[boy 3] Come on. Over here. -[boy 2] We got him.
You belong out here with the animals.
translation.es: Tu lugar es aquí con los animales.

translation.en: [boy 1] We better not see you in town again.
translation.es: Más vale que no vuelvas a la ciudad.

translation.en: Are you gonna run back to your mommy?
-[male victim] But they jumped me. -[woman] It doesn't matter.
translation.es: - Pero ellos me atacaron.- No importa.
Es hora de ir a casa.

translation.en: They've been picking on me for weeks.
You have much to learn, Jin Kazama.
translation.es: Tienes mucho que aprender, Jin Kazama.

translation.en: [Jin] They say I don't belong there.
that it's because you don't belong?
Way to make me feel better.
Jin, those kids resent you because they're never gonna leave this place.
translation.es: Jin, esos chicos te resienten porque nunca podrán irse de aquí.

translation.en: Yeah, they grow up here, they… they live here, and they die here,
translation.es: Sí, crecen aquí, viven aquí y mueren aquí.

translation.en: you're meant for more in this life.
translation.es: Tú estás destinado a mucho más.

translation.en: And deep down, they know that.
translation.es: Y, en el fondo, ellos lo saben.

translation.en: One day you'll leave this island, you'll travel, you'll see the world,
translation.es: Un día dejarás esta isla,viajarás, verás el mundo,

translation.en: and, I have no doubt, accomplish great things.
translation.es: y no tengo dudasde que lograrás grandes cosas.

translation.en: [mom sighs] You shouldn't have hurt them.
You've been training in the Kazama fighting style
translation.es: Practicaste el estilo de lucha Kazama

translation.en: long enough to defend yourself without hurting them,

translation.es: Eso es lo que me decepciona.

translation.en: You lost a fight today, Jin.
[mom] You lost the fight with yourself, Jin.
translation.es: Perdiste la pelea contra ti, Jin.

translation.en: -I know you're better than that. -[gasps, exhales]
I know I've asked this before, but why did we move here?
translation.es: Sé que ya te lo pregunté,pero ¿por qué nos mudamos aquí?

translation.en: the world is filled with both good and evil.
translation.es: que en el mundo conviven el bien y el mal.

translation.en: We moved here so I could make sure you experience good before anything else.
translation.es: Nos mudamos aquí para asegurarme de que experimentes el bienantes que nada.

translation.en: [exhales] How come we never really talk about my dad?
translation.es: ¿Por qué nunca hablamos de mi papá?

translation.en: [mom] Let's get back to your studies, young man.
You pick, English or math lesson first.
[Jin] Can't we just train or do some kicking drills or something?
translation.es: ¿Podemos entrenaro practicar mis patadas o algo así?

translation.en: Oh, you've done enough fighting today.
Remember, dear, the first opponent you must defeat in any fight is yourself.
translation.es: Recuerda, el primer oponenteque debes vencer eres tú mismo.

translation.en: If you're distracted, how are you gonna see the clear path to defeating someone else?
translation.es: Si te distraes, ¿cómo verás con claridadla forma de vencer a otros?

translation.en: Always focus on the immediate moment.
not the outcome you want later.
translation.es: ni en el resultado que quieres obtener.

translation.en: The only thing that should exist is the technique, the form.
translation.es: Lo único que debe existires la técnica, la forma.

translation.en: When you have mastered the moment,
then, and only then, can you start moving ahead.
translation.es: solo entonces, podrás empezar a avanzar.

translation.en: Remember, you can counter any opponent's size and strength
translation.es: Puedes contrarrestarel tamaño y la fuerza de tu oponente
La Técnica Ryu-un-tsui del estilo Kazama.

translation.en: [mom] Now, time to battle another opponent all fighters will eventually face.
translation.es: Es hora de vencer a un oponenteque todos los luchadores enfrentarán.

translation.en: [Jin] What did you eat when you were in Africa?
Uh, did they have fish and rice? Stuff we eat?
but we had all kinds of great food on safari.
translation.es: Pero había comida deliciosa en el safari.

translation.en: I wish I could've brought the WWWC cooks back with me.
translation.es: Quisiera haberme traídoa los cocineros de la WWWC.

translation.en: -They were culinary ex-- [gasps] -[man] I wanna talk to that boy!
translation.es: - Eran expertos…- ¡Quiero hablar con ese muchacho!

translation.en: I said I wanna talk to that boy.
translation.es: Dije que quiero hablar con ese muchacho.

translation.en: Someone oughta teach that kid some respect!
translation.es: Alguien debería enseñarlea respetar a otros.

translation.en: -They always pick fights with me. -Remember what I said.
translation.es: - Siempre me provocan.- Recuerda lo que dije.

translation.en: I want you to apologize to the young man for hurting him.
translation.es: Quiero que te disculpescon el joven por lastimarlo.

translation.en: We should take ownership of our actions.
Maybe you had a man in that house,
translation.es: Quizá si hubiera un hombre en esa casa,

translation.en: Boy… needs to learn… some manners.
Young man, take your father home.
translation.es: Jovencito, lleva a tu padre a casa.

translation.en: we should never take pleasure in the suffering of others.
translation.es: No debemos regocijarnoscon el sufrimiento ajeno.

translation.en: I saw you smile when I disarmed and defeated Mr. Hirai.
translation.es: Te vi sonreírcuando desarmé y vencí al señor Hirai.

translation.en: The most important thing I can teach you
translation.es: Lo más importante que puedo enseñarte

translation.en: is to control your anger and use whatever power you have for good.
translation.es: es a controlar tu iray usar la fuerza que tienes para el bien.

translation.en: And it's important to me that you use that gift for good.
translation.es: Y es importante para míque uses ese don para el bien.

translation.en: I just redirected his force and used his body weight against him.
translation.es: Solo redireccioné su fuerzay usé su peso corporal contra él.

translation.en: The rest was up to gravity.
translation.es: El resto lo hizo la gravedad.

translation.en: You are not to come out, no matter what.
translation.es: No debes salir, sin importar qué pase.

translation.en: If anything happens to me, I want you to go find your grandfather,
translation.es: Si me pasa algo, quiero que busques a tu abuelo,
A veces, la vidarequiere que te defiendas,

translation.en: Promise me you'll always know when to use which.
translation.es: Prométeme que siempre sabráscuándo hacer cada cosa.

translation.en: -[Jin gasps] -[guard] Where do you think you're going?
He keeps trying to get into the building.
This is the third time this week.
translation.es: Es la tercera vez esta semana.

translation.en: I'll, uh, handle it from here.
You've snuck into the wrong place, kid.
translation.es: Te metiste en el lugar equivocado.

translation.en: I'm trying to find my grandfather.
I doubt you're related to anyone in this building.
translation.es: Dudo que seas parientede alguien en este edificio.

translation.en: There have been incidents with an intruder trying to sneak into the building.
translation.es: Un intruso intentó colarse en el edificio.

translation.en: All I see is a street rat
translation.es: Solo veo a un niño indigente

translation.en: that, thanks to you, has wandered in.
translation.es: que, gracias a ti, logró entrar.

translation.en: I'm no rat, and I'm no child.
translation.es: No soy indigente ni soy un niño.

translation.en: My mother sent me here to find you.
translation.es: Mi madre me envió a buscarlo.
Ella dijo que usted es mi abuelo.

translation.en: Leave the boy here with me.
Do not make me repeat myself.
I didn't come here to fight you.
I was taught never to fight unless attacked.
translation.es: Me enseñaron a no peleara menos que me atacaran.

translation.en: [Heihachi] If your name is indeed Kazama…
translation.es: Si en verdad te apellidas Kazama,
eres una deshonra para tu familia.
Y no me vuelvas a molestar.

translation.en: Before that green monster killed my mother,
translation.es: Antes de que ese monstruo verdematara a mi madre,

translation.en: she told me to find you.
translation.es: ella me dijo que lo buscara.

translation.en: She made me promise to find my grandfather, Heihachi Mishima.
translation.es: Me hizo prometer que encontraríaa mi abuelo, Heihachi Mishima.

translation.en: It came for us, and it killed my mother.
translation.es: Vino por nosotros y mató a mi madre.

translation.en: And with or without your help, I'll find it, and I'll kill it.
translation.es: Con o sin su ayuda,lo encontraré y lo mataré.

translation.en: The creature that killed your mother
translation.es: A la criatura que mató a tu madre

translation.en: -[Jin gasps] -[Heihachi] I will train you to fight him.
translation.es: Te entrenaré para que lo enfrentes.

translation.en: I will train you to defeat him.
In return, you will prove to me you're worthy of your ancestry,
translation.es: A cambio, me demostrarásque eres digno de tu linaje,
